text.div:
Generated Narrative: StructureDefinition EHDSCondition

NameFlagsCard.TypeDescription & Constraints
EHDSCondition 0..*BaseCondition model
Instances of this logical model can be the target of a Reference
identifier 0..*IdentifierCondition identifier
subject 1..1EHDSPatientIndicates the patient or group who the condition record is associated with.
description 0..1stringCondition specification in narrative form
code 0..1CodeableConceptCode identifying the condition, problem or diagnosis
Binding Description: (preferred): ICD-10*, SNOMED CT, Orphacode if rare disease is diagnosed
onsetDate 0..1dateTimeOnset date of a problem/condition
endDate 0..1dateTimeThe date or estimated date that the condition resolved or went into remission.
category 0..*CodeableConceptCategory or categories of the problem.
clinicalStatus 0..1CodeableConceptStatus of the condition/problem (active, resolved, inactive, ...)
Binding Description: (preferred): HL7 Condition-clinical
resolutionCircumstances[x] 0..*Describes the reason for which the status of the problem changed from current to inactive (e.g. surgical procedure, medical treatment, etc.).
resolutionCircumstancesCodeableConceptCodeableConcept
resolutionCircumstancesStringstring
resolutionCircumstancesReferenceReference(Any)
severity 0..1CodeableConceptA subjective assessment of the severity of the condition as evaluated by the clinician.
Binding Description: (preferred): HL7 Condition-severity
anatomicLocation[x] 0..*The anatomical location including laterality where this condition manifests itself.
Binding Description: (preferred): SNOMED CT
anatomicLocationCodeableConceptCodeableConcept
anatomicLocationEHDSBodyStructureEHDSBodyStructure
stage 0..*CodeableConceptStage/grade usually assessed formally using a specific staging/grading system. Multiple assessment systems could be used.
Binding Description: (preferred): e.g. TNM, ICD-O-3, Bi-Rads, Li-Rads, â€¦
diagnosisAssertionStatus 0..1CodeableConceptAssertion about the certainty associated with a diagnosis. Diagnostic and/or clinical evidence of condition.
Binding Description: (preferred): HL7 Condition-ver-status
asserter 0..1EHDSHealthProfessionalThe asserter of the condition
assertedDate 0..1dateTimeDate and time of the diagnosis assertion

Documentation for this format

name: EHDSCondition
title: Condition model
description: EHDS refined base model for A clinical condition, problem, diagnosis, or other event, situation, issue, or clinical concept that has risen to a level of concern.

element.short: Condition model
element.definition: EHDS refined base model for A clinical condition, problem, diagnosis, or other event, situation, issue, or clinical concept that has risen to a level of concern.

element.short: Condition identifier
element.definition: Condition identifier

element.short: Indicates the patient or group who the condition record is associated with.
element.definition: Indicates the patient or group who the condition record is associated with.

element.short: Condition specification in narrative form
element.definition: Condition specification in narrative form

element.short: Code identifying the condition, problem or diagnosis
element.definition: Code identifying the condition, problem or diagnosis

binding.description: ICD-10*, SNOMED CT, Orphacode if rare disease is diagnosed

element.short: Onset date of a problem/condition
element.definition: Onset date of a problem/condition

element.short: The date or estimated date that the condition resolved or went into remission.
element.definition: The date or estimated date that the condition resolved or went into remission.

element.short: Category or categories of the problem.
element.definition: Category or categories of the problem.

element.short: Status of the condition/problem (active, resolved, inactive, ...)
element.definition: Status of the condition/problem (active, resolved, inactive, ...)

element.short: Describes the reason for which the status of the problem changed from current to inactive (e.g. surgical procedure, medical treatment, etc.).
element.definition: This field includes free text if the resolution circumstances are not already included in other fields such as surgical procedure, medical device, etc., e.g. hepatic cystectomy (this will be the resolution circumstances for the problem "hepatic cyst" and will be included in surgical procedures).

element.short: A subjective assessment of the severity of the condition as evaluated by the clinician.
element.definition: A subjective assessment of the severity of the condition as evaluated by the clinician.

element.short: The anatomical location including laterality where this condition manifests itself.
element.definition: The anatomical location including laterality where this condition manifests itself.

element.short: Stage/grade usually assessed formally using a specific staging/grading system. Multiple assessment systems could be used.
element.definition: Stage/grade usually assessed formally using a specific staging/grading system. Multiple assessment systems could be used.

binding.description: e.g. TNM, ICD-O-3, Bi-Rads, Li-Rads, â€¦

element.short: Assertion about the certainty associated with a diagnosis. Diagnostic and/or clinical evidence of condition.
element.definition: Assertion about the certainty associated with a diagnosis. Diagnostic and/or clinical evidence of condition.

element.short: The asserter of the condition
element.definition: The asserter of the condition

element.short: Date and time of the diagnosis assertion
element.definition: Date and time of the diagnosis assertion
